name: Dot cross
description:
A simple, two day build i made where the objective is to navigate a green dot across a busy road while trying to avoid red squares as they speed by. There isn't any sound right now, not that the game really needs it, but once i get better at sound engineering or find a sound engineer i fully intend to add music and maybe a few object sounds. The game should save a high score automatically upon game-over. if you find any bugs please contact me so i can fix them.

updates*

added music to menus

added sound effects to buttons

added main game music

fixed pause
